channel.title: Authors on Data Science Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Data Science Studio

item.description: Institute on Aging and Longlife Health (IALH) works with data from the residents of Vancouver Island related to their cognitive and physical aging. Augmenting these data with medical history collected by Island Health presents a unique opportunity to explore human aging through the big data of clinical context. Data Science Studio was formed to assist UVic researchers to gain access to the electronic health records (EHR) of Island Health and to promote sound practices of longitudinal modeling in their analysis.
